request.description:
This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to search for blog posts based on a specific keyword. The keyword parameter in the query string is used to filter the search results.

### Request

- Method: GET
    
- Endpoint: {{localhost}}/blog/search
    
- Query Parameters:
    
    - keyword: The keyword to search for in the blog posts.
        

### Response

The response will include the details of the blog posts that match the provided keyword. The structure of the response body will include the relevant information about the blog posts, such as title, author, date, and content.

### Headers

The request may include standard headers such as Accept, Accept-Encoding, and User-Agent.

### API Endpoints

This endpoint is part of the Supplya collection and is designed to facilitate searching for blog posts based on specific keywords.
